section.name: de.jaret.util
section.p: The jaret utils are a collection of helper classes for the jaret project. These are needed by all other jaret components. The utils are subject to frequent changes since they collect everything factored out of the other jaret parts. There are simple widgets within the util package. See screenshots here.

The utilities include:
several date and time utilities including a holiday enumerator to enumerate the holidays for a specific locale. The realisation of the enumerator is not yet completed ... more countries to come.
a simple SWT console widget
two simple list composer widgets (classic and csv)
